data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Creão-Duarte, Antonio José, Cabral, Valberta Alves, Lourenço, Aline (2017): A new species of Lycoderes Sakakibara (Hemiptera, Membracidae, Stegaspidinae) from Brazil. Zootaxa 4281 (1), DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4281.1.5|1 occurrence
